rows.title: Crunchy Data
rows.snippet: Crunchy Data is a leading provider of trusted open source PostgreSQL technology, support and training. Crunchy offers Crunchy Certified PostgreSQL, the most advanced pure open source RDBMS on the market.

rows.title: Crunchy PostgreSQL 9.6 Backup
rows.snippet: Meant to be executed upon demand, the Crunchy backup container will run pg_basebackup against a running database container and write the backup files to a mounted directory.

rows.title: Crunchy PostgreSQL 9.6 Backup RHEL-test
rows.snippet: Meant to be executed upon demand, the Crunchy backup container will run pg_basebackup against a running database container and write the backup files to a mounted directory.
